file.name: rest_api.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Open-Bus Back-End
  description: 'API documentation for the back-end of open-bus'
  version: 1.0.0
  
externalDocs:
  description: open-bus at GitHub
  url: https://github.com/hasadna/open-bus
  
tags:
- name: transport
  description: "Case 1: Investigation of a specific case"
- name: routeStats
  description: "Case 2: Investigation of a route or a few routes in specified time ranges"
  
paths:
  /transport:
    get:
      tags:
      - transport
      summary: Finds transport by route ID and origin aimed departure time
      description: ""
      operationId: findTransport1
      parameters:
      - name: "routeId"
        in: "query"
        required: true
        schema:
          type: "number"
      - name: "originAimedDepartureTime"
        in: "query"
        required: true
        schema:
          type: "string"
          format: "date-time"
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Trip'
components:
  schemas:
    Point:
      required:
      - lat
      - lon
      type: object
      properties:
        lat:
          type: number
        lon:
          type: number

    Trip:
      required:
      - name
      - photoUrls
      type: object
      properties:
        tripId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        routeId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        routeShortName:
          type: string
        routeLongName:
          type: string
        agencyName:
          type: string
          format: int64
        routeType:
          type: integer 
          description: GTFS route type
        stops:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Stop'
        startZone:
          type: string
          example: השומרון
        endZone:
          type: string
          example: סובב חיפה
        isLoop:
          type: boolean
        distance:
          type: number
          description: "Distance from the start point, probably in meters"
        duration:
          type: number
          description: "Trip duration, in hours"
        speed:
          type: number
          description: "Average speed, in km/h"
        shape:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Point'
    Stop:
      required:
      - stopCode
      - stopName
      - stopLocation
      type: object
      properties:
        stopCode:
          type: number
        stopName:
          type: string
        stopLocation:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Point'
